TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以处理事件以提供自定义排序。You can handle the event to provide custom sorting. 仅当未设置属性并且属性设置为`false`时, 才会发生此事件。This event occurs only when the property is not set and the property is set to `false`. 对于正在排序的列中的每对单元格, 此事件发生一次。This event occurs once for each pair of cells in the column being sorted. 仅当用户单击属性值为的列的标头时, 或在调用重载时才会发生这种情况。It occurs only when the user clicks the header of a column with a property value of , or when you call the overload. 对于属性值为的列发生此事件时, 必须通过属性自行显示排序标志符号。When this event occurs for a column with a property value of , you must display the sorting glyph yourself through the property. 使用此事件可以使用一列或多列中的单元值对行进行排序。You can use this event to sort rows using the cell values in one column or in multiple columns. 使用和属性来比较属性中指定的列中的单元值。Use the and properties to compare cell values in the column specified in the property. 使用和属性可以通过集合访问其他列中的值。Use the and properties to access values in other columns through the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在多列排序中使用。The following code example demonstrates the use of in a multiple column sort. 此示例是在[如何:自定义 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-sorting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)中的排序。This example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize Sorting in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-sorting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare/CS/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare/VB/form1.vb#10)]

related.span: 如何：自定义 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的排序方式

span.span: Gets the column being sorted.
The to sort.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于确定和控制编程排序中的排序行为。This property is useful in determining and controlling sort behavior in programmatic sorts. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在多列排序中使用。The following code example demonstrates the use of in a multiple column sort. 在此示例中, 如果在已排序的列中存在相同的值, 则使用 ID 列确定最终顺序, 因此, 如果 ID 列中存在重复值, 则不会执行其他排序。In this example the ID column is used to determine the final order if there are identical values in the sorted column, so no additional sorting will be done if there are duplicate values in the ID column. 此示例是在[如何:自定义 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-sorting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)中的排序。This example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize Sorting in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-sorting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare/CS/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare/VB/form1.vb#10)]

related.span: 如何：自定义 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的排序方式

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当基于多列中的单元值对行进行排序时, 此属性很有用。This property is useful when sorting rows based on the cell values in multiple columns. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在多列排序中使用。The following code example demonstrates the use of in a multiple column sort. 此示例是在[如何:自定义 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-sorting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)中的排序。This example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize Sorting in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-sorting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SortResult { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.SortResult : int with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示被比较单元格将遵循的排序顺序。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the order in which the compared cells will be sorted.

value.span: 如果第一个单元格将排在第二个单元格之前，则小于零；如果第一个单元格和第二个单元格的值相等，则等于零；如果第二个单元格将排在第一个单元格之前，则大于零。

span.span: Less than zero if the first cell will be sorted before the second cell; zero if the first cell and second cell have equivalent values; greater than zero if the second cell will be sorted before the first cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此值通常是在事件处理程序中执行的最后一个操作。Setting this value is typically the last operation you will perform in a handler for the event. 通常会将此值设置为比较方法 (如) 的返回值。You will typically set this value to the return value of a comparison method such as . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在多列排序中使用。The following code example demonstrates the use of in a multiple column sort. 此示例是在[如何:自定义 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-sorting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)中的排序。This example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize Sorting in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-sorting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
